TITLE: Pinterest climbs on user numbers and Elliott investment even as financials disappoint
SUMMARY: Pinterest shares jumped after the company's user numbers surpassed analysts' estimates in a gloomy quarter for social media.

TITLE: Oil major BP boosts dividend as quarterly profits jump on high commodity prices
SUMMARY: U.K. oil giant BP on Tuesday reported bumper second-quarter profits, benefitting from a surge in commodity prices.

TITLE: AMD beats on earnings and revenue, but third-quarter forecast comes in light
SUMMARY: AMD currently has a significant market opportunity as its primary rival for PC and server chips, Intel, stumbles with execution.

TITLE: PayPal jumps as Elliott Management says it has a $2 billion holding in the financial services company
SUMMARY: PayPal stock has been cut in half in 2022, but it's getting a vote of confidence from hedge fund Elliott Management, which is also a big Pinterest investor.

TITLE: Robinhood cutting about 23% of jobs, releases second quarter earnings
SUMMARY: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev said Tuesday in a press release that the company will reduce its headcount by approximately 23%.

TITLE: Starbucks earnings beat Wall Street estimates, fueled by U.S. demand for cold drinks
SUMMARY: Shares of Starbucks have fallen 27% this year, dragging its market value down to $98.37 billion.

TITLE: Airbnb stock slumps despite record-breaking bookings
SUMMARY: Airbnb's revenue jumped 58% year-over-year to $2.1 billion helping to drive the company’s most profitable second quarter to date.

TITLE: Ferrari boosts full-year guidance after a record second quarter
SUMMARY: Ferrari increased its full-year guidance after a quarter that set records for revenue, profit and new orders.

TITLE: JetBlue shares tumble as costs push it to a loss despite profit forecast on higher fares
SUMMARY: JetBlue posted a second-quarter loss and scaled back capacity growth plans.

TITLE: Uber reports another big loss but beats on revenue, shares pop 19%
SUMMARY: Uber reported a second quarter loss on Tuesday but beat analyst estimates for revenue.

TITLE: Robinhood cutting about 23% of jobs, releases second-quarter earnings
SUMMARY: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev said Tuesday in a press release that the company will reduce its headcount by approximately 23%.

TITLE: Palantir shares fall more than 12% following earnings report
SUMMARY: Palantir reported second-quarter results Monday that showed a loss per share compared with projections for earnings, but the company beat revenue expectations.

TITLE: Palantir shares fall more than 14% following earnings report
SUMMARY: Palantir reported second-quarter results Monday that showed a loss per share compared with projections for earnings, but the company beat revenue expectations.

TITLE: Spirit Airlines posts loss on surge in costs, expects Florida challenges to continue
SUMMARY: Spirit's expenses soared more than 66% compared with three years ago. Its fuel bill more than doubled.

TITLE: Allbirds 'dramatically' slows pace of new hires as loss widens
SUMMARY: Allbirds announced cost-cutting efforts as the sustainable shoe maker reported wider loss compared with a year earlier.

TITLE: Novavax cuts 2022 revenue guidance in half, stock tanks in after-hours trading
SUMMARY: The Maryland biotech company cut its 2022 sales outlook by about 50% and now expects to generate $2 billion to $2.3 billion in revenue.

TITLE: Nvidia warns on second-quarter revenue, shares dip
SUMMARY: Nvidia shares dipped after the company released preliminary earnings that show second-quarter revenue of $6.7 billion, well below its outlook.

TITLE: Coinbase shares drop on billion-dollar loss in second quarter and revenue miss
SUMMARY: Coinbase's revenue declined almost 64% in the quarter as cryptocurrency prices fell.

TITLE: Sweetgreen's stock plummets after salad chain lowers forecast, announces layoffs and office downsizing
SUMMARY: Sweetgreen said it will lay off 5% of its workforce and downsize to a smaller office building to lower its operating expenses.

TITLE: Roblox misses on top and bottom, shares dip 12%
SUMMARY: Roblox reported second-quarter results on Tuesday that missed analyst estimates on the top and bottom lines.

TITLE: Deliveroo first-half losses widen as food delivery firm plans exit from the Netherlands
SUMMARY: Deliveroo reported a pretax loss of £147.3 million in the first six months of the year, up 54% from the same period a year ago.

TITLE: Sweetgreen's stock falls after salad chain lowers forecast, announces layoffs and office downsizing
SUMMARY: Sweetgreen said it will lay off 5% of its workforce and downsize to a smaller office building to lower its operating expenses.

TITLE: Norwegian Cruise Line shares fall as revenue, outlook lag pre-pandemic levels
SUMMARY: The company reported second-quarter results that lagged pre-pandemic levels and warned of persistent volatility ahead.

TITLE: Disney streaming subscriber growth blows past estimates, as company beats on top and bottom line
SUMMARY: Disney posted better-than-expected earnings on both the top and bottom line, bolstered by increased spending at its domestic theme parks.

TITLE: Rivian posts second-quarter revenue above estimates, but expects a wider loss for the year
SUMMARY: Electric vehicle maker Rivian maintained its full-year guidance for deliveries, but trimmed its full-year financial outlook.

TITLE: Warby Parker slashes sales outlook for the year as loss widens
SUMMARY: Warby Parker on Thursday joined the slew of retailers that have cut their financial forecasts for the year.

TITLE: Jim Beam maker says some customers trading down, others still paying more for high-end liquor
SUMMARY: Some price-sensitive whiskey and tequila drinkers are swapping out their high-end bottles for cheaper options, according to Beam Suntory.

TITLE: Huawei's second quarter revenue rises slightly from a year ago
SUMMARY: Chinese telecommunications giant Huawei released figures Friday that showed its first quarterly increase in revenue since 2020.

TITLE: Saudi Aramco profit surges 90% in second quarter amid energy price boom
SUMMARY: Saudi oil giant Aramco reported a stunning 90% surge in second quarter net income and record half year results on Sunday.

TITLE: Walmart sticks with second-half outlook after earnings beat expectations
SUMMARY: The retailer's profits are under pressure, as consumers feel pinched by inflation and buy fewer high-margin items, such as apparel and electronics.

TITLE: Home Depot beats second-quarter earnings expectations, stands by 2022 guidance
SUMMARY: Home Depot reported second-quarter earnings and revenue that beat expectations Tuesday morning.

TITLE: Target’s earnings take a huge hit as retailer sells off unwanted inventory
SUMMARY: The big-box retailer cut its profit outlook in June, saying it would take a hit as it marked down unwanted goods and canceled merchandise orders.

TITLE: Lowe's reports mixed second-quarter results, citing shortened spring that hurt sales
SUMMARY: Lowe's said improved operations offset lower-than-expected sales that were hurt by a shortened spring.

TITLE: Tencent, the $370 billion Chinese tech giant, posts first ever revenue decline
SUMMARY: Tencent posted its first ever quarterly year-on-year revenue decline as stricter regulations around gaming in China and a resurgence of Covid hit the tech giant.

TITLE: Cisco tops estimates on revenue and profit and gives optimistic annual sales forecast
SUMMARY: Cisco said revenue will grow by about 5% in the new fiscal year, accelerating from 3% in the year that just ended

TITLE: Kohl's cuts guidance, blaming inflation for softer sales from middle-income shoppers
SUMMARY: Kohl's said its middle-income customers have been particularly pressured by higher inflation.

TITLE: Zoom pares back annual forecast as revenue growth slows to single digits
SUMMARY: Zoom's finance chief, Kelly Steckelberg, said revenue would have grown faster if it weren't for the strong U.S. dollar and online business performance.

TITLE: Dick's Sporting Goods boosts 2022 outlook after second-quarter earnings top estimates
SUMMARY: Dick's Sporting Goods reported quarterly earnings and revenue that topped analysts' expectations and boosted its financial outlook for the year.

TITLE: Macy's cuts full-year forecast despite strong quarter, fearing shoppers will pull back on spending
SUMMARY: Macy's on Tuesday cut its full-year forecast, saying it anticipates deteriorating consumer spending on discretionary items like apparel.

TITLE: Nordstrom cuts full-year forecast, citing slowing customer demand
SUMMARY: Nordstrom slashed its financial forecast for the full year as the department store chain faces slowing sales and a glut of inventory.

TITLE: Nvidia says gaming market conditions are 'challenging,' Q3 forecast misses
SUMMARY: Nvidia's success in the past two years has been largely attributed to the quality of its latest generation of graphics cards.

TITLE: Salesforce trims full-year expectations for earnings and revenue
SUMMARY: Salesforce beat estimates for the latest quarter but gave a disappointing forecast for the year.

TITLE: Snowflake shares soar following revenue beat
SUMMARY: Shares of the cloud data platform provider Snowflake popped more than 17% in extended trading on Wednesday.

TITLE: Gap withdraws 2022 financial outlook as Old Navy sales fall in second quarter
SUMMARY: Gap withdrew its financial outlook for the year after its second-quarter sales fell from a year ago and it works to fix its struggling business.

TITLE: Peloton shares plummet after company reports a big loss and declining revenue
SUMMARY: Peloton has pursued sweeping changes, including price hikes and a shift to emphasizing subscriptions, that have yet to fully pay off.

TITLE: Best Buy's quarterly sales drop, as inflation-weary consumers pull back on spending
SUMMARY: Best Buy also reaffirmed its guidance for the fiscal year, saying it expects softer demand for consumer electronics.

TITLE: Fintech firm Klarna's losses triple after aggressive U.S. expansion and mass layoffs
SUMMARY: The firm, which allows users to spread the cost of purchases over interest-free installments, saw a jump in operating expenses and defaults.

TITLE: Russia's Gazprom rallies by over 20% after bumper profit and dividend announcement
SUMMARY: Russian gas giant Gazprom posted a record first-half profit on Tuesday and promised new dividends to shareholders.

TITLE: Lululemon jumps after it boosts outlook and posts strong earnings beat
SUMMARY: Lululemon reported second quarter earnings after the bell on Thursday.
